docs.snippet: The university on Monday ordered the campus chapter of Sigma Alpha Epsilon to vacate its house after videos appeared to show members singing slurs....
docs.lead_paragraph: The university on Monday ordered the campus chapter of Sigma Alpha Epsilon to vacate its house after videos appeared to show members singing slurs.
docs.abstract: University of Oklahoma cuts ties to college fraternity Sigma Alpha Epsilon and orders campus chapter to vacate its house, after videos come to light that show a group of young white people singing song laden with anti-black lyrics and at least one reference to lynching.

headline.seo: University of Oklahoma Cuts Ties to Sigma Alpha Epsilon Fraternity Over Racist Videos
headline.main: Fraternity Is Closed Over Video With Slurs
headline.print_headline: Fraternity Is Closed Over Video With Slurs

byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez reported from Norman, and Richard Perez-Pena from New York. Liam Stack contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA

docs.snippet: Business startup Zenefits has raised another $66.5 million from investors, months after its first capital-raising, following a pattern set previously by a handful of hot, young consumer companies that proved their worth to investors over a short s...
docs.lead_paragraph: Business startup Zenefits has raised another $66.5 million from investors, months after its first capital-raising, following a pattern set previously by a handful of hot, young consumer companies that proved their worth to investors over a short span.

headline.main: Zenefits Raises $66.5 Million in Accelerating Cycle for Venture Capitalists
headline.print_headline: Zenefits Raises $66.5 Million in Accelerating Cycle for Venture Capitalists

docs.snippet: A cellphone video of a high school restroom fight that left a 16-year-old Delaware girl dead shows the victim on the ground, struggling to fight back and escape as she is repeatedly hit and kicked in the head while her assailant holds on to her ha...
docs.lead_paragraph: A cellphone video of a high school restroom fight that left a 16-year-old Delaware girl dead shows the victim on the ground, struggling to fight back and escape as she is repeatedly hit and kicked in the head while her assailant holds on to her hair.

docs.snippet: Robert Wiesenthal will become chief executive of Blade, an on-demand app service he co-founded that shuttles customers by helicopter and small plane....
docs.lead_paragraph: Robert Wiesenthal will become chief executive of Blade, an on-demand app service he co-founded that shuttles customers by helicopter and small plane.
docs.abstract: Robert Wiesenthal plans to resign post as chief operating officer of Warner Music Group to become chairman and chief executive of Blade; company, which was co-founded by Wiesenthal, provides on-demand helicopter and small plane services that have already attracted some 22,000 customers.

headline.main: Warner Music Executive Is Leaving to Lead Helicopter Start-Up Blade
headline.print_headline: Warner Music Executive to Lead Copter Start-Up

docs.snippet: “I’ll show you mine, you show yours” has been around for a long time. It’s the medium that makes it different and scary....
docs.abstract: “I’ll show you mine, you show yours” has been around for a long time. It’s the medium that makes it different and scary.

headline.main: The Issue With Sexting Isn’t the Sex. It’s the Text.
